title: Urgot feels Clunky after release
body:
I updated league for patch 7.15, once the update finished i went to go play a game of the new Urgot Rework and in my experience i feel as if Urgots{{champion:6}}  W. Ability feels a bit clunky. It feels less playable in my opinion and i know that they just released him but hopefully Riot will
fix this issue{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: He feels worse than old Urgot. This new version is too gimmicky. Your damage is almost all in the legs and outside Q and ult, you have very short range. Being able to W during the E animation would be a nice change. Maybe a buff to ult? (like reduced armor/mr for the duration). What if purge applied a small slow or must we get frozen mallet for that?
